normalised: Wow, athlete bios are fascinating, no? Remember Milkha Singh's life story? Inspiring! Learned so much about P T Usha recently too. I wish there were more on women athletes from India, especially from smaller towns like Raipur. Maybe one about a kabaddi player who made it big after studying at Delhi University? Like a Chak De!
